Affinity for Curses [i](This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Curse you control.)[/i]
When Ulgleyth enters or attacks, each opponent loses 2 life.
Whenever Ulgleyth attacks, for each cursed opponent he isn't attacking, create a token copy of him that isn't legendary. It enters the battlefield tapped and attacking that player. Exile those tokens at the end of combat.
